_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: ClassiCube(MGC)
author: panel@qoutsy.33mail.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
mkdir /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server 
apt update 
apt -y upgrade
apt -y install wget unzip mono-runtime
LATEST_RELEASE=$(wget -qO- https://api.github.com/repos/UnknownShadow200/MCGalaxy/releases/latest | grep browser_download_url | cut -d '"' -f 4)
wget $LATEST_RELEASE -O MCGalaxy.zip
unzip -j MCGalaxy.zip
chmod +X *.dll
chmod +X *.exe
echo "Done"
exit 0
